scripts.migrate:prod: PG_PASSWORD=password PG_USER=klika PG_DATABASE=klikatech npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env production
scripts.migrate:dev: PG_PASSWORD=password PG_USER=klika PG_DATABASE=klikatech npx sequelize-cli db:migrate --env development
scripts.migration:prod-rollback: PG_PORT=5432 PG_PASSWORD=password PG_USER=klika PG_DATABASE=klikatech npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo
scripts.migration:dev-rollback: PG_PASSWORD=password PG_USER=klika PG_DATABASE=klikatech npx sequelize-cli db:migrate:undo
